segments.text: This kitchen is a disaster waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is overflowing, and water is everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a disgusting mess on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman just stands there, oblivious, drying her plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Doesn't she notice the growing puddle around her feet?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Meanwhile, those children are causing more trouble.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One boy is on a wobbly stool, stealing cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister is right there, aiding and abetting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They clearly know what they are doing is wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's frustrating to watch such a lack of awareness and discipline.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This entire scene is just poorly managed.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone really needs to take control here.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water damage will be extensive, I'm sure.
segments.speaker: PAR
